resources.string:
"The player needs to solve every dungeon room in order to solve the entire level.

The dungeon room has many blocks of different types.

There are some sliding blocks which the player has to move to make his way through the dungeon.

The player has to collect all keys in order to open the doors for the next puzzle rooms. Use the joystick on-screen to move your player in the desired direction.

In order to use the items, the player needs to click the on-screen buttons after reaching the desired destination. For instance, if the user needs to open the exit door, he first needs to reach the door, then press the key button on the screen to open the door. Similarly to break the breakable wall using the bomb, the player needs to be adjacent to the wall. Potions can be used anytime, anywhere in the game."

"Try to solve the dungeon room in least number of steps and also in least amount of time to get most number of gold coins.

Use the bombs to break the breakable walls. There might be treasure chest or keys behind the breakable wall.

Use your potions to slow down the timer to reduce the time required to solve the dungeon room. This can earn you more gold.

Use sliding blocks to open doors and extinguishing fire by placing them on floor switches."
